synthesis_conditions.notes: Designed to exhibit colossal PTE and NTE at different temperature regions accompanied with hysteretic magnetic transitions.

Four stages of linear thermal expansion of volume observed. Colossal PTE behavior between 180 and 240 K with a volumetric thermal expansion coefficient of 1498 MK@1. NTE behavior between 300 and 350 K with a volumetric thermal expansion coefficient of -489 MK@1.
Thermally induced hysteretic magnetic transition observed. Sharp decrease in cT values from 240 K with T1/2ﬂ = 226 K and a sharp increase in cT observed with T1/2› = 327 K.
